text_ruling:
If there is an icebreaker already installed on Dinosaurus, the Runner
can install a different icebreaker onto Dinosaurus, trashing the
previously installed icebreaker. [Official FAQ]

If the Runner has no free MU but a Dinosaurus that is not currently
hosting an icebreaker, he can install an icebreaker on Dinosaurus
without trashing a program. Declaring where a program is hosted is part of the install action, and so the memory cost of the program
does not need to be taken into account. [Official FAQ]
